subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Lasith Malinga and Shaun Tait have given up other forms of cricket to concentrate on Twenty20, and they are dominating the Indian Premier League with their unorthodox styles.
snippet: Lasith Malinga and Shaun Tait have given up other forms of cricket to concentrate on Twenty20, and they are dominating the Indian Premier League with their unorthodox styles.
